data.name: Gone Home Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Gone Home Original Soundtrack (GH:OST) is all the original compositions created by Chris Remo for the game Gone Home, in convenient MP3 format!

Track list:

1. See You Soon 00:59

2. At the New House/First Day of School 01:22

3. Hanging Out with Girls/Dealing with Roots 00:48

4. Default Friends/Ship Date 01:25

5. Stick with the Group 00:54

6. The House, Part 1 (Original) 02:55

7. The Nunnery 00:57

8. A Very Long Phase/Getting Lonnie 01:16

9. Daniel 00:51

10. Just Gone 00:54

11. The House, Part 2 (Original) 02:54

12. Dedication 01:04

13. Life Moves On 01:04

14. In the Attic 00:54

15. I Said Yes 01:23

16. I'll See You Again 00:53

17. The House, Part 1 (In-Game) 05:49

18. The House, Part 2 (In-Game) 05:49

Songs will be placed in a subfolder of your Gone Home Steam install directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\GoneHome\
